message: Bo needs a history lesson...when he was shown in the White House kitchen with the beer he brewed, he said that the only other President who brewed beer in the White House was George Washington...Bo, FYI..George Washington never lived in the WH,,it wasn't built when he was President... if George Bush had made that mistake, the liberal main stream media would have plastered his mistake all over the papers and on TV...

My son worked for Sendiks all through high school & college. During the school vacations & every summer he worked full time & even got a Christmas bonus. He loved working for them & was treated well. Maybe not offering full time work to someone is a way of getting rid of employees who aren't working out well. He was pd $8.00 an hr, which was way over minimum wage then.
